localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Bored of long news articles? Nyus is a news app designed for teenagers. It gives news in the form of memes and makes news fun and engaging. We aggregate our news from the top news sources in India and are rated 4.6 stars on Play Store.
blogPost.body: Bored of long news articles? Nyus is a news app designed for teenagers. It gives news in the form of memes and makes news fun and engaging. We aggregate our news from the top news sources in India and are rated 4.6 stars on Play Store.
blogPost.title: Nyus - Get news in the form of memes
blogPost.author: Puru Thakkar

localize.description: 厌倦了冗长的新闻文章？Nyus是一款专为青少年设计的新闻应用。它以备忘录的形式给出新闻，让新闻变得有趣和吸引人。我们从印度的顶级新闻来源汇总我们的新闻，并在Play Store上被评为4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以备忘录的形式获取新闻

localize.description: 厭倦了冗長的新聞文章？Nyus是一款專爲青少年設計的新聞應用。它以備忘錄的形式給出新聞，讓新聞變得有趣和吸引人。我們從印度的頂級新聞來源彙總我們的新聞，並在Play Store上被評爲4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以備忘錄的形式獲取新聞

previous.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
previous.title: Serenity Notes - End-to-end encrypted collaborative notes app

localize.description: 撰写私人笔记，有选择地与他人分享，并且仍然可以控制谁可以访问你的数据。同时在所有平台上都能获得出色的离线优先体验。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的协作笔记应用。

localize.description: 撰寫私人筆記，有選擇地與他人分享，並且仍然可以控制誰可以訪問你的數據。同時在所有平臺上都能獲得出色的離線優先體驗。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的協作筆記應用。

next.excerpt: With Palette you can add colors to your palette and click to copy the HEX when you need a color.
next.title: Palette - Store and share colors between apps

localize.description: 通过调色板，你可以将颜色添加到调色板中，当你需要一种颜色时，可以点击复制HEX。
localize.tagline: 存储和共享应用程序之间的颜色

localize.description: 通過調色板，你可以將顏色添加到調色板中，當你需要一種顏色時，可以點擊複製HEX。
localize.tagline: 存儲和共享應用程序之間的顏色
